careerBrief.title: DoughyDelights
careerBrief.description: Doughy Delights  is a web-based project having multi-tier architecture with H2 as the backend database. User Interface is prepared in JSP. The business logic will reside in Java. The presentation layer will communicate with the business layer through Spring MVC Framework.
responsibilities: Most of the development was in Java 1.8
Contribution towards data discovery, storage management, data transformation.
